attributes.action: Replace  key Chinese imports with home-grown products to alleviate unemployment
attributes.additional_details: Set up a Project team to analyse the Chinese imports data and set up a few pilot projects to replace certain chosen products with home-grown ones. They will of course be made in new, green, reduced carbon businesses.
attributes.background: Start a program to replace products we import from China by creating new, clean, green industries in the UK. This needs to be run in parallel with a training and apprenticeship program to improve the skill-base of the young people who are unemployed due to Covid & improve the balance of payments.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for UK manufacturers and consumers, not the UK Government and Parliament.
